Posts.Content: Hi there, just saw your post on the main page, don't generally see the Breast Forum posts as my husband has lung cancer with brain mets - however, he had 5 consecutive days of whole brain radiotherapy in January and felt ok enough to travel home on tube and bus every day afterwards. Hope this helps & very best wishes to you Xx
Posts.Title: Sorry if this sounds daft but How do you feel after radiotherapy ...
